short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use arrow keys on youtube without spoiling yourself

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever been watching a suspenseful YouTube video, and then a sponsored segment pops up. You can't skip the long sponsor segment because you will spoil yourself from where you are in the video, and might spoil the end result of a game. This helps with that :D
